EmailTemplate.description: Email Notification to Partner upon Approval or Rejection of Partner Deal
EmailTemplate.name: PRM Email Notification to Partner upon Approval or Rejection of Partner Deal
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Name}- Update : Deal Acceptance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Partner_Sub_Agent_Contact__c},
Your sales lead has been accepted. You will be contacted shortly by your assigned sales resource.
Thanks, Channel Support
